properties.areaDesc: Waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA extending from 20 nm to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 1 at 6:19AM EST until February 2 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 3 to 6 ft expected.

* WHERE...Savannah to Altamaha Sound from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST SUNDAY
